Name: Average time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time reduction of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE across all process variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE in the context of domestic declarations
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Minimun time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Request Payment in rejected claims
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE in the process of travel expense claims
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time to complete Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE before reaching Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimun resolution time of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE in the context of pre-paid travel costs
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Total time it takes from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time for Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE across different departments from 2017 to 2018
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and the end of case grouped by the last value of org:resource
